trans-unit.source: Controls code access permissions for event logging.
trans-unit.target: 控制事件記錄的程式碼存取使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Do not grant <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> to partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 請勿授與<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The ability to read and write the event log enables code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application.
trans-unit.target: 讀取和寫入事件記錄檔的能力可以讓程式碼來執行動作，例如發出事件記錄檔訊息，另一個應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the event source that is specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the event log does not exist, a new event source is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源，所指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件記錄檔的屬性不存在，會建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 或 Windows Server 2003 中建立事件來源，您必須具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 這項需求的原因是，必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性、 以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼存取安全性記錄檔，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that represent permission entries.
trans-unit.target: 表示權限項目的物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission.PermissionEntries" /> property is set to this value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission.PermissionEntries" /> 屬性設為這個值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified permission entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的使用權限項目，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="permissionAccessEntries" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="permissionAccessEntries" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the permission state (full access or no access to resources).
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定使用權限狀態 (對資源有完整存取權或沒有存取權)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified permission state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定權限狀態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies an access level.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定存取層級。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to read or write events.
trans-unit.target: 用來讀取或寫入事件的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified access levels and the name of the computer to use.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的存取層級和要使用的電腦名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of permission entries for this permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個使用權限要求的使用權限項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the permission entries for this permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中包含這個使用權限要求的使用權限項目。
